name: Coleslaw
keywords: cabbage, scallion, tart apples, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 6 cups thinly sliced cabbage (a mix of red, Savoy or Napa)
1 tart apple, peeled, quartered and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the vinegar and sugar to dissolve the sugar. Whisk in the mayonnaise and yogurt. In a large serving bowl, mix the cabbage, scallions, apple and parsley. Pour over the dressing and fold together. Taste and add salt, if needed. Let sit for about 30 minutes before serving -- you may want to put it in the refrigerator, but make sure it comes to room temperature before serving.
